intro.title: AI + education. One platform. For all students.
intro.introduction: Dutch education is under pressure. More and more students are struggling, the opportunity gap is growing, and teachers are becoming overburdened. At the same time, technology offers unprecedented opportunities – if we deploy it smartly and safely.
intro.paragraph1: BeSmart Campus heralds a new phase in which AI and teachers work side by side. Our smart, safe AI technology helps students learn at their own level – with personal explanation, practice, and support. Teachers remain in control, students gain understanding. This is how we build fairer, more personal, and more effective education.
intro.paragraph2: Not a replacement, but a powerful supplement. Not expensive tutoring for the happy few, but support for every child – through school. Our mission is clear: reducing learning gaps and promoting equal opportunities in and with secondary education.

platform.title: The BeSmart Learning Platform
platform.description: The BeSmart Learning Platform is a digital learning environment where students can learn independently with the help of AI. They gain access to explainer videos, assignments, and immediate support – precisely when they need it.
platform.platformItem1: personal AI-tutor available 24/7 in a safe, shielded learning environment
platform.platformItem2: Unique, Tiny Talks™: thousands of short, powerful explainer videos per topic
platform.platformItem3: More than 100,000 practice assignments with real-time feedback
platform.platformItem4: High-quality content, developed together with schools and teachers
platform.platformItem5: Full alignment with school methods and central examination requirements
